K12D0414_H0399:1b-1: aa n'a bi la tantra r'a dz'a n'a ma /
K12D0414_H0399:1b-3: rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba /
K12D0414_H0399:1b-4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0414_H0399:1b-5: sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas //
K12D0414_H0399:1b-6: rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:1b-7: snang ba med cing dpe med pa //
K12D0414_H0399:1b-8: tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-2: mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-3: ngang gis sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-4: mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-5: khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-6: bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-7: rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-8: snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-9: kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-10: kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-11: kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-12: blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed //
K12D0414_H0399:2a-13: de nyid nges par yang dag par //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-0: rgyu @2b yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-2: bsgoms pa med cing byang chub med //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-3: rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-4: thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /
K12D0414_H0399:2b-5: sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-6: rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-7: kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-8: kha cig zhi ba chen po che //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-9: kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-10: kha cig 'dar zhing g-yo ba dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-11: glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-12: lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-13: kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-14: kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-15: dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang //
K12D0414_H0399:2b-16: 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus; ;de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog /
K12D0414_H0399:2b-17: sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-2: de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-4: phan 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-5: phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-6: gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-7: lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-8: rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes bya ra gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-9: phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-10: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-11: sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-12: rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-13: me long lta bu gcig nyid de //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-14: dang po grvar ni rtogs par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-15: so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-16: shar gyi grvar ni rnam par brgyan //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-17: bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-18: byang gi grvar ni rnam par spros //
K12D0414_H0399:3a-19: mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-0: bag chags med grva @3b rjes rtogs byed //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-1: gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-2: grva yi dbus ni thams cad du //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-4: ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag /
K12D0414_H0399:3b-5: sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-6: de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-7: de bzhin grva bzhir gsungs pa ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-8: sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dge ba //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-9: dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-10: mi bskyod pa yis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-11: zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-13: dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-14: dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-15: rta babs la sogs thams cad ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-16: ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-17: sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-18: de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-19: gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel ba //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-20: ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-21: de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-22: dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-23: dril bu do shal brtag pa ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-24: rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-25: sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-26: chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-27: chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-28: de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-29: bla re la sogs gang bres pa //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-30: dngos po la sogs dang por nges //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-31: sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-32: dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-33: gos phreng de dag thams cad ni //
K12D0414_H0399:3b-34: rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-0: @4a *// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-1: dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-2: de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-3: grva yi mtshams ni thams cad du //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-4: rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-5: rdo rje rin po che yis spras //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-6: zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-7: thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-8: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-9: ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-10: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-11: de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-12: sku gsungs thugs ni nye ba'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-13: rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med bla ma slob ma rnams gsal bar //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-14: rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-15: sbyin sreg yang ni bshad pa yang //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-16: lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-17: rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni; ;thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-18: bye brag phyed pas me nang du //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-19: gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-20: sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-21: thams cad kyi ni bsreg blugs bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-22: gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-23: yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-24: de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-25: rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-26: sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-27: gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-28: de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-29: phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci //
K12D0414_H0399:4a-30: gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-0: @4b de ni gsal bar brjod par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-1: yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-2: gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-3: skye ba med cing snang med pa //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-4: mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-5: 'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-6: sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-7: lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-8: phung po khams dang skye mched kyi; ;rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-9: yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-10: de kun yang dag rab brtags shing //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-11: gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-12: lha zhes bya bar yang dag bshad //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-13: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-14: de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-15: lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-16: gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-17: de nas skyil krung bcas nas ni //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-18: sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-19: rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-20: de nyid mthong bar bzhag par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-21: snying ga'i gnas su lag pa gnyis //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-22: 'bad pas mnyam par sbyar nas su //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-23: mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-24: gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /
K12D0414_H0399:4b-26: de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /
K12D0414_H0399:4b-28: myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur //
K12D0414_H0399:4b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /
K12D0414_H0399:4b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag /
K12D0414_H0399:5a-0: thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa @5a *//
K12D0414_H0399:5a-3: nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-4: sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-5: sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-6: thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-7: sems can don du snying rje che //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-8: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-9: sna rtse'i dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-10: de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-11: mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-13: de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-14: rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-16: gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-17: rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-18: sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-19: khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha; bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-20: dam tshig ces bya rab 'bad par //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-21: gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-22: de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-23: de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-24: gang tshe dam chig 'dod chags sems //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-25: des ni de nyid rab tu spyod //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-26: gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-27: de ni sems can yod ma yin //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-28: de la kun tu rtog pa yi //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-30: khrag ni chen po zos nas ni //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-31: 'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya //
K12D0414_H0399:5a-32: gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-0: khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrag @5b par bya //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-1: de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-2: bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-3: dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-4: sha chen du ni rab tu dbye //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-5: mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-6: bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-7: gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-8: nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-9: phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-10: de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-11: chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-12: sbas pa'i char ni gnas pa 'di //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-13: chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-14: bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-15: dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni; ;'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-16: 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur //
K12D0414_H0399:5b-18: dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang
K12D0414_H0399:5b-19: ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i
K12D0414_H0399:5b-20: rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom
K12D0414_H0399:5b-21: pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba
K12D0414_H0399:5b-22: rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta ga ya dha ra dang /
